revisionDesc.change: CREATED: This bibl record was autogenerated from a Zotero record.

analytic.title: Dialogues of the Assyrian Church of the East: Christological, Ecclesiological and Ecumenical Challenges

biblStruct.note: An overview on the official dialogue of the Assyrian Church of the East with the Catholic Church since 1994 with the Christological Declaration of 11 November 1994 and the meetings of the Dialogue Commission since then is presented. Other dialogues, such as the unofficial Syriac Dialogue of Pro Oriente, the process with the Chaldeans and important points in the dialogues with other Churches (Syrian Orthodox, Coptic Orthodox, Russian Orthodox) or the MECC are indicated.

body.bibl: Hainthaler, Theresia. “Dialogues of the Assyrian Church of the East: Christological, Ecclesiological and Ecumenical Challenges.” Proche-Orient Chrétien 74:2 (2024): 193–211.
Theresia Hainthaler, Dialogues of the Assyrian Church of the East: Christological, Ecclesiological and Ecumenical Challenges, Proche-Orient Chrétien 74:2 (2024): 193–211.
